wordpressPost.title: NaNoWriMo day 12 – sloooowly, very slooowly
wordpressPost.content: Only wrote something like 500 words today, it just did not want to flow. Blah, I’m not winning this thing by a long shot and if it goes on like this I won’t even reach my stated goal of 25k words. Fail.
